Name: Plumed Wrath, Quetzalcoatl
Effect: [Rush][Ambush][Breakthrough]n/On Play - Choose an opposing Unit. If that Unit is Exhausted, Ensnare it. Otherwise, Exhaust that Unit. Attuned: Do this 2 times.

Name: Woodland Elf
Effect: On Play - Exhaust an opposing Unit.

Name: Beastie Caretaker
Effect: On Play - Gain a Mana Fragment for each other allied Unit.

Name: Bird of Paradise
Effect: On Play - Gain a Mana Fragment.

Name: Wild Hunt
Effect: [Brave][Quick]n/Deal damage to an opposing Unit equal to the cost of the highest costed allied Unit. Attuned: Draw 1.

Name: Verdant Druid
Effect: At the end of your turn, gain 2 Mana Fragments.

Name: Forest Elemental
Effect: [Blocker] On Play - Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Add any Units from amoungst them to your hand then send the rest to the bottom of your deck.

Name: Rose Nymph, Carmagnole
Effect: On Play - Exhaust and Ensnare an opposing Unit. Attuned: Exhaust and Ensnare up to 2 opposing Units instead.n/When an opposing Unit loses Ensnared, deal 2 damage to it.

Name: Wandering Beastmaster
Effect: On Play - Summon a Wolf or Sheep Token. Attuned: Summon both instead.

Name: Cultivate
Effect: Choose 1:n/1) Increase your maximum Mana by 1.n/2) Gain a Fragmented Mana Gem and draw 1.

Name: Elven Prankster
Effect: Choose an opposing Exhausted Unit. Ensnare it.
